posts.post_content: Selling   SGC 1   1905 Souvenir Post Card Shop---Team Composite---Cleveland Naps ( Nap Lajoie--Joss--Flick--etc)  The notation of front reflects the grade--Postmark on back  Sept. 12, 1905--Check Scans--$2200---Paypal or Check,  I would also take some trade if interested.  thanks,  Don
